mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE id = #{id} and remove = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, create_time, last_modified, remove, username, password, age, sex, phone, email) VALUES (#{id}, #{createTime}, #{lastModified}, #{remove}, #{username}, #{password}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.update: update user set email = #{email} where id = #{id}
update user set remove = TRUE where id = #{id}
